Kconfig.name: BOARD_COMPILE_DEFINITIONS
Kconfig.help: add custom compile defitions to this specific target

Kconfig.name: BOARD_CONSTRAINED_FLASH
Kconfig.help: flag to enable constrained flash options (eg limit init script status text)

Kconfig.name: BOARD_CONSTRAINED_MEMORY
Kconfig.help: flag to enable constrained memory options (eg limit maximum number of uORB publications)

Kconfig.name: BOARD_CRYPTO
Kconfig.help: Enable PX4 Crypto Support. Select the implementation under drivers

Kconfig.name: BOARD_ETHERNET
Kconfig.help: flag to indicate that ethernet is enabled

Kconfig.name: BOARD_EXTERNAL_METADATA
Kconfig.help: flag to exclude metadata to reduce flash

Kconfig.name: BOARD_IO
Kconfig.help: name of IO board to be built and included in the ROMFS (requires a valid ROMFSROOT)

Kconfig.name: BOARD_LINKER_PREFIX
Kconfig.help: optional to prefix on the Linker script.

Kconfig.name: BOARD_LINUX_TARGET
Kconfig.help: Board Platform is running the Linux operating system

Kconfig.name: BOARD_LOCKSTEP
Kconfig.help: forces lockstep behaviour, despite REPLAY env variable

Kconfig.name: BOARD_LTO
Kconfig.help: Enables LTO flag in linker Note: Highly EXPERIMENTAL, furthermore make sure you're using a modern compiler GCC 9 or later

Kconfig.name: BOARD_NOLOCKSTEP
Kconfig.help: forces nolockstep behaviour, despite REPLAY env variable

Kconfig.name: BOARD_NO_HELP
Kconfig.help: optional condition flag to disable help text on constrained flash systems

Kconfig.name: BOARD_ROMFSROOT
Kconfig.help: relative path to the ROMFS root directory

Kconfig.name: BOARD_ROOTFSDIR
Kconfig.help: Configure the root directory in the file system for PX4 files

Kconfig.name: BOARD_TESTING
Kconfig.help: flag to enable automatic inclusion of PX4 testing modules

Kconfig.name: ORB_COMMUNICATOR
Kconfig.help: Enable support for the uorb communicator for distributed platforms

Kconfig.name: COMMON_BAROMETERS
Kconfig.help: Enable default set of barometer drivers

Kconfig.name: CYPHAL_APP_DESCRIPTOR
Kconfig.help: When the board uses the UAVCANv0 bootloader functionality you need a AppImageDescriptor defined

Kconfig.name: CYPHAL_GETINFO_RESPONDER
Kconfig.help: Responds to uavcan.node.GetInfo.1.0 request sending over node information See https://github.com/UAVCAN/public_regulated_data_types/blob/master/uavcan/node/430.GetInfo.1.0.uavcan for full response

Kconfig.name: CYPHAL_NODE_MANAGER
Kconfig.help: Implement Cyphal PNP server functionality and manages discovered nodes

Kconfig.name: COMMON_DIFFERENTIAL_PRESSURE
Kconfig.help: Enable default set of differential pressure drivers

Kconfig.name: COMMON_DISTANCE_SENSOR
Kconfig.help: Enable default set of distance sensor drivers

Kconfig.name: COMMON_GPIO
Kconfig.help: Enable default set of GPIO drivers

Kconfig.name: COMMON_HYGROMETERS
Kconfig.help: Enable default set of hygrometer sensors

Kconfig.name: COMMON_IMU
Kconfig.help: Enable default set of IMU drivers

Kconfig.name: COMMON_INS
Kconfig.help: Enable default set of INS sensors

Kconfig.name: COMMON_LIGHT
Kconfig.help: Enable default set of light drivers

Kconfig.name: DRIVERS_LIGHTS_RGBLED_IS31FL3195
Kconfig.help: Enable support for rgbled IS3FL3195 driver

Kconfig.name: DRIVERS_LIGHTS_RGBLED_LP5562
Kconfig.help: Enable support for RGBLED LP5562 driver

Kconfig.name: COMMON_MAGNETOMETER
Kconfig.help: Enable default set of magnetometer drivers

Kconfig.name: COMMON_OPTICAL_FLOW
Kconfig.help: Enable default set of optical flow drivers

Kconfig.name: COMMON_OSD
Kconfig.help: Enable default set of OSD drivers

Kconfig.name: COMMON_RC
Kconfig.help: Enable default set of magnetometer drivers

Kconfig.name: COMMON_RPM
Kconfig.help: Enable default set of RPM drivers

Kconfig.name: COMMON_TELEMETRY
Kconfig.help: Enable default set of telemetry drivers

Kconfig.name: TRANSPONDER
Kconfig.help: Enable default set of transponder drivers

Kconfig.name: BOARD_UAVCAN_PERIPHERALS
Kconfig.help: list of UAVCAN peripheral firmware to build and embed

Kconfig.name: EKF2_AUX_GLOBAL_POSITION
Kconfig.help: EKF2 auxiliary global position fusion support.

Kconfig.name: EKF2_MULTI_INSTANCE
Kconfig.help: EKF2 support multiple instances and selector.

Kconfig.name: FIGURE_OF_EIGHT
Kconfig.help: Enable support for the figure of eight loitering pattern in fixed wing. NOTE: Enable Mavlink development support to get feedback message.

Kconfig.name: MAVLINK_DIALECT
Kconfig.help: Select the Mavlink dialect to generate and use.

Kconfig.name: MODE_NAVIGATOR_VTOL_TAKEOFF
Kconfig.help: Add VTOL takeoff mode to enable support for MAV_CMD_NAV_VTOL_TAKEOFF. The VTOL takes off in MC mode and transition to FW. The mode ends with an infinite loiter

Kconfig.name: COMMON_SIMULATION
Kconfig.help: Enable default set of simulation modules

Kconfig.name: MODULES_UXRCE_DDS_CLIENT
Kconfig.help: Enable support for the UXRCE-DDS Client

Kconfig.name: ZENOH_CONFIG_PATH
Kconfig.help: Path to store network, publishers and subscribers configuration

Kconfig.name: ZENOH_DEBUG
Kconfig.help: Set Zenoh debug level 0: NONE 1: ERROR 2: INFO + ERROR 3: DEBUG + INFO + ERROR

Kconfig.name: ZENOH_SERIAL
Kconfig.help: Enables transport over serial (Not yet supported on NuttX/Linux)

Kconfig.name: SYSTEMCMDS_I2C_LAUNCHER
Kconfig.help: Daemon that starts drivers based on found I2C devices.

Kconfig.name: SYSTEMCMDS_IO_BYPASS_CONTROL
Kconfig.help: Simple daemon that listens uORB actuator_outputs to control PWM output Useful for full offboard control using RTPS. WARNING: No mixer, hence no safety use at your own risk

Kconfig.name: SERIAL_PASSTHRU_UBLOX
Kconfig.prompt: "Detect and Auto Connect on U-Center messages"
Kconfig.help: This option will enable the cdc_acm_check to launch The passthru driver.

Kconfig.name: SERIAL_PASSTHRU_UBLOX_BAUDRATE
Kconfig.help: This option sets the baudrate for the passthru.

Kconfig.name: SYSTEMCMDS_SERIAL_PASSTHRU
Kconfig.help: Enable support for passing one sevice to another i.e ttyACM to ttyS5
